Html:
hi guys!

firstly, i have to say that G-XNA is awesome!

and here is my problem:

i have complied those tuts and succeed 

but some of them just cant run.

when i start debug it. it stops in here :

" collision = Newton.NewtonCreateBox(nWorld,

                                boundingBox.X * scale.X,

                                boundingBox.Y * scale.Y, 

                               boundingBox.Z * scale.Z, offsetMatrix);"

 

and says :

Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt.

 

 

and for those complied but which cant run . also stop at the line that reference to the function that dont belong XNA.

did i miss something?

 

i can run tut  1.2.3.6 and 7.

 

thx for help

sorry for my BAD english

P.S i have followed the document to build DLL 2 times. 

Edit: well i found there is something wrong with NewtonPhysics.cs?

Did you download the appropriate version of Newton as instructed in the installation guide?

If you still have that problem with the correct Newton.dll, then I have no idea why it's complaining since we've tried it on many machines with different version of Windows and never encountered that problem.

Ohan

appropriate version of Newton?

my bad... 

im using wrong versoin of Newton.

 

thx for reply
